attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Abolition of all taxes.      

                                         With all taxes abolished the government would be able to re-circulate an agreed percentage of savings, that are in the banking system, for the benefit of society. The money would go ‘out’ as benefits and ‘wages.’ After being spent it would come back into the banking system again. This can then be continuously repeated. It would free up the economic system and be much more efficient.
